medical_history.chief_complaint: Multiple clear vesicles and hemorrhagic papules on the posterior aspect of the right shoulder.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 5 years prior, with lesions that spontaneously manifest as clear or blood-filled vesicles. These are exacerbated by physical contact from certain articles of clothing. Increased sensitivity to touch of the affected area was noted.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Increased sensitivity to touch; no known drug allergies; not taking any medications.
medical_history.family_history: Family history of acne and skin cancer.
